channel.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Video Podcasts - Travel Locations
channel.description: Videos of Maine Ghost Hunters featuring investigations, team documentaries and instructional information sessions.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters - Travel Locations
channel.itunes:summary: Maine Ghost Hunters conducts investigations at locations that are out of our normal range of travel. These investigations have taken place, generally speaking, at locations that require an overnight stay, or which were long term trips away from our home state of Maine.
channel.itunes:keywords: Maine Ghost Hunters, paranormal, spirit, haunted, investigation, travel
channel.itunes:author: Maine Ghost Hunters

item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Old Hollywood
item.description:
Maine Ghost Hunters investigates one of the oldest building in Old Hollywood.
We were invited to investigate specific areas of this classic historic building in one of the oldest sections of Hollywood, while we were out in Los Angeles in early 2010. This video isn't about evidence so much as it's about sharing our impromptu investigative experience. This is an invitation-only situation and we're incredibly fortunate to have been offered the tour, and the time to explore this California gem.
Thank you much to those that put us in contact with this awe inspiring estate. We are, and forever will be, incredibly grateful for the generosity that was offered us.
Maine Ghost Hunters
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters conducts a training investigation in Old Hollywood
